QuestData.Title: Old Friends, New Enemies
QuestData.Description:
I cannot believe Orgrim would continue to do Blackhand's bidding after all the destruction he has wrought.
We must confront him. Join me at the village along Orunai Coast and we will confront my oldest friend.
QuestData.LogDescription: Confront Orgrim Doomhammer at the village along Orunai Coast.
QuestData.RewardText: Orgrim will not stop this foolishness, so we must stop him.
